Text: La Plata ALarry I am mailing the Part application for La Plata A to you today I am attaching the cover letter to the EPA for you to print out onto your letterhead Please note that carbon monoxide emissions are included in threshold applicability however they are not included for fee purposes therefore your fees for La Plata are based on NOx SO VOC and PM Also as a reminder the letter from the EPA requested the application by October Please let me know if you have any questions or comments Thank you Mary EPAdoc
